Program demystifies the evolving world of CIOs in a typical global corporation. Coverage being introductory familiarizes participants nicely through some of the nuances & emerging trends. When I took the course, participant numbers were fewer, so feedback was quite delayed. So one should plan to be patient to get their peer reviews. Based on peer reviews, I sensed much variation in their expectations. Few sections are in French with Subtitles. Subtitle quality requires audit/review.
